title: AI focus
subtitle: Search + Q&A • Quality • Safety
summary: Shipping useful AI features that are predictable, measured, and kind to users.

steps.label: Context
steps.body: Users needed answers from docs without guessing where to look. We had to be fast, grounded, and safe.

steps.label: What I changed
steps.body: Doc search + Q&A with embeddings and citations, fallbacks for cost/latency, and light redaction for safety.

steps.label: Quality
steps.body: Evals in CI caught regressions. I tuned reranking, prompt shape, and caching until it felt native.

steps.label: Results
steps.body: Grounded answers with citations; sub-second p99 on cached hits; costs down ~35%.
